title: Crashed as entering champ select, given loss and -IP
body: I entered champion select for a Ranked match and the client crashed instantly.  Additionally I lost IP and was given a que timer.

replies.body: Every single person I'm playing with just crashed, first one in the first champ select, next one me, in the next champ select, and the third one just on client.
happened to me 3 times as well

Crashes in champ select are often a result of the client losing all connection to the game platform service. A poor connection to the servers is often the cause and can be influenced by ISP routing or local network settings. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in troubleshooting this issue.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through that guide.
